description.value:
Activate Cast a Spell

A gravemist taper is a conical candle with symbols of terror and death carved into the wax. The taper can be used as a catalyst when casting an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mist] spell, burning the taper away, coloring the mist gray, and filling the mist with ghastly, shadowy shapes. The flat check to overcome the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] state from the mist rises to 7, and a creature who fails such a check becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1}. This aspect of the spell has the emotion, fear, and mental traits.
